Chesapeake Technology International | Junior and Lead Software Engineers | MD, VA, CA, CO | REMOTE, Onsite http://www.ctic-inc.com

Chesapeake Technology a 50 person DoD R&D company supporting remote work with locations in Denver, MD, VA, and CA is looking for software engineers with interest in SDR’s, networking, and visualization. We’re primarily a JVM/Java shop integrating sensors and equipment into a 3D GIS tool for RF modeling and analysis. We’re pushing hard for government open source! I’ve worked everything from CRDT’s to OpenGL shaders to even sewing sensors into a vest. Lots of opportunities to learn including graduate education to self-directed training. We're looking for people that are passionate about RF and GIS and want to work in small teams. Schedules are flexible and we rely on tools to work asynchronously. We won't whiteboard you. Check out the open sites below and apply closest to you: https://ctic.hua.hrsmart.com/hr/ats/JobSearch/viewAll
